walk_detection.name: PawControl Walk Detection Alerts
walk_detection.description: Run actions when a PawControl walk starts or ends using the walk in progress binary sensor.

walk_start_actions.name: Walk started actions
walk_start_actions.description: Actions to run when the walk starts.

walk_end_actions.name: Walk ended actions
walk_end_actions.description: Actions to run when the walk ends.

logbook_entry.name: Add logbook entry
logbook_entry.description: Record walk start/end transitions in the Home Assistant logbook.

safe_zone_alert.name: PawControl Safe Zone Alert
safe_zone_alert.description: Notify or run actions when a PawControl dog leaves or returns to a safe zone using the in-safe-zone binary sensor.

leave_delay.name: Outside safe zone delay
leave_delay.description: Time the dog must remain outside before triggering alerts.

return_delay.name: Return safe zone delay
return_delay.description: Time the dog must remain inside before triggering return actions.

left_actions.name: Left safe zone actions
left_actions.description: Actions to run when the dog leaves the safe zone.

return_actions.name: Returned safe zone actions
return_actions.description: Actions to run when the dog returns to the safe zone.

logbook_entry.name: Add logbook entry
logbook_entry.description: Record safe zone transitions in the Home Assistant logbook.
